text:
Hi Guys

I have a question regarding the HubSpot API and Landing Pages. I have created a custom module with a text field called "Event title", I have added this module to a template and created multiple landing pages from that template. But the Event title field is not appearing in the HubSpot API for most landing pages even it contains the data. Please help me troubleshoot this issue.

I tried to work around this by making the (new) listing template of type "blog" and/or "blog_post" and removing the drag and drop areas but then the template switcher nags that switching from a drag and drop template to a coded template is impossible :joy:
